mainSection.title: Corporate receivables management
paragraphs: We offer outsourcing of receivables management, thanks to which your receivables will be properly taken care of.

We process your invoices quickly, reliably, discreetly and with maximum care. Thanks to our information portal, you have constant overview of the status of your receivables. Our services in this area include:

services.title: Our services include:
items: We charge costs only if a legal solution to your receivable is necessary, or extraordinary expenses in case of a personal visit to the debtor by our specialist
We ensure execution of the claimed receivable including out-of-court and judicial collection of domestic (foreign) receivables
Evaluation of the profitability of receivables for collection
Taking over individual receivables for collection
Taking over a package of receivables for collection

benefits.title: Why entrust receivables management to us?
benefits.description: Outsourcing receivables management brings you a number of benefits that will help you focus on your core business

items.title: Cost savings
items.description: You don't need to employ your own specialists for debt collection, you only pay for services actually provided.

items.title: Professional approach
items.description: Our specialists have many years of experience in debt collection and know all the necessary procedures.

items.title: Clear reporting
items.description: Through our information system, you have constant overview of the status of your receivables.

items.title: Speed and efficiency
items.description: Thanks to specialization and experience, we can handle your receivables faster and more efficiently.

items.title: Legal background
items.description: We have a team of lawyers available who are ready to solve even complex cases.

items.title: Discretion
items.description: We approach all cases with maximum discretion and professionalism.
